item.title: Sharlee add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Sharlee add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Sharlee add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Not only will we have to repent for the sins of bad people; but we also will have to repent for the appalling silence of good people." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Sharlee add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "I have decided to stick to love...Hate is too great a burden to bear." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Sharlee add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Sharlee add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "and he suddenly knew that if she killed herself, he would die. Maybe not immediately, maybe not with the same blinding rush of pain, but it would happen. You couldn't live for very long without a heart." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Sharlee add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "There are millions of people in the world, and the spirits will see that most of them you never have to meet. But there are one or two you are tied to, and the spirits will cross you back and forth, threading so many knots until they catch and you finally get it right." -- Jodi Picoult
